CocoaConf 2017 Chicago

Apr 24, 2017 • Nick Calabro

Tech Talk

I really enjoyed giving a quick and dirty rant to the entire CocoaConf conference about mechanical keyboards and how they can help us developers master our craft. Between expressing ourselves with keyboard customization and improving our health by preventing RSI, there are so many reasons to give a lot of thought into what we're slamming our fingers on for ten hours a day.

Here are some resources to get your started on your keyboard journey.

MechanicalKeyboards.com

r/MechanicalKeyboards

Massdrop

WASD

CODE Keyboard

Don't hesitate to reach out if you're confused about keycaps, cases, switches, anything at all! I'm happy to help. Email (nick [at] nickcalabro.com), Tweet, or however else you'd like to get in touch.
